desc: Experience a full exercise class right from your own living room! Echelon's Smart Connect Exercise Bike works directly with live or on demand classes to keep you motivated through every step of your work! Financing options available. Free shipping & money back guarantee!

layout.text: Explore thousands of live & on-demand bike, row, treadmill, and fitness screen workouts whenever and wherever you are. Includes equipment-free full-body workouts like yoga, barre, pilates, and so much more.
